name: Wonfourn
description: Wonfourn challenges you to fulfill your destiny by embarking on a grand adventure seeking fame, fortune and glory. The firstborn chosen child from each of the games 6 nations have come of age and must prove their worth in an epic quest of survival.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ X2, min. 2.8 GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 2048 MB memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad / AMD® Phenom™ X4, min. 3,4 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 4096 MB memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
